caption: Relating to the deceptive trade practice of providing false or misleading information regarding the health of an animal being sold or offered for sale.
undersanding:
Summary (English):
This bill amends the Business & Commerce Code to make it a deceptive trade practice to knowingly sell sick animals without disclosing their health condition, or provide false/misleading health records or screening information about animals being sold. This law applies to all animal sellers in Texas, including those serving Chinese customers, but does not specifically target Chinese immigrants or businesses.

Summary (Chinese):
该法案修改商业和商务法规，将故意销售患病动物而不披露其健康状况，或在销售动物时提供虚假/误导性的健康记录或筛查信息定义为欺诈性商业行为。该法律适用于德克萨斯州所有动物销售者，包括服务华人顾客的商家，但并未特别针对华裔移民或企业。

Most likely committees:
1. Business & Commerce Committee
2. Agriculture & Livestock Committee
3. State Affairs Committee
